meanings.definition: A unit of currency in Iran, equal to ten rials.
meanings.sent1: In Iran, you can buy many things with a toman.
meanings.sent2: I exchanged my rials for a toman to make shopping easier.
meanings.sent3: The toman rolled off the table and into the piggy bank, eager to be spent.
meanings.sent4: Her smile was like a shiny toman, brightening up the room.
meanings.sent5: The toman jingled in his pocket, a sound of wealth and possibility.

meanings.definition: A type of fish found in the waters of the Indian Ocean.
meanings.sent1: The toman fish swam gracefully through the clear waters.
meanings.sent2: Fishermen were excited to catch a toman for dinner.
meanings.sent3: The toman fish wore sunglasses and a tiny hat, looking quite stylish.
meanings.sent4: The toman fish moved with the elegance of a dancer in the ocean.
meanings.sent5: Children giggled as they watched the toman fish playfully dart around.

meanings.definition: A type of traditional Iranian headgear.
meanings.sent1: The toman headgear shielded him from the scorching sun.
meanings.sent2: She adorned her outfit with a beautiful toman on her head.
meanings.sent3: The toman headgear doubled as a snack holder, much to everyone's surprise.
meanings.sent4: His toman headgear was a crown of protection against the elements.
meanings.sent5: The toman headgear gleamed in the sunlight, a symbol of tradition and style.
